trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is insufficient execution stack available to allow most methods to execute.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠可用的執行堆疊以允許大部分的方法執行時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.InsufficientExecutionStackException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
